Name: Gurugedara
About the game: Guru Gedara is a leading platform for interacting with the teachers and students. Meet friends and attend classes in a virtual environment. Teacher can use this application and students can use the application available on Google Play to experience the virtual environment. Join today and explore more about the virtual experience you can gather in a classroom.
